item.title: Wednesday, 07 January 2026
item.description:
Tomorrow, Wed, 7 Jan 2026 has been declared a day of Total Fire Ban in the Wimmera, South West and Central (includes Melbourne and Geelong) district(s) of Victoria. No fires can be lit or be allowed to remain alight in the open air from 12:01 AM on Wed, 7 Jan 2026 until 11:59 PM Wed, 7 Jan 2026.

Central: YES - TOTAL FIRE BAN IN FORCE
East Gippsland: NO - RESTRICTIONS MAY APPLY
Mallee: NO - RESTRICTIONS MAY APPLY
North Central: NO - RESTRICTIONS MAY APPLY
North East: NO - RESTRICTIONS MAY APPLY
Northern Country: NO - RESTRICTIONS MAY APPLY
South West: YES - TOTAL FIRE BAN IN FORCE
West and South Gippsland: NO - RESTRICTIONS MAY APPLY
Wimmera: YES - TOTAL FIRE BAN IN FORCE

Fire Danger Ratings
Bureau of Meteorology forecast issued at: Tuesday, 06 January 2026 16:00 PM

Central: EXTREME
East Gippsland: HIGH
Mallee: HIGH
North Central: HIGH
North East: HIGH
Northern Country: HIGH
South West: EXTREME
West and South Gippsland: HIGH
Wimmera: EXTREME
